channel.title: Weird error that make server crash!
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -510 at client.process(client.java:17612) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:50)
Sometimes in my server tihs appear, what could be wrong?
